title: Reflective Systematic Lesson Design Model-Based Teacher Education Simulation Course

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Classroom design and execution simulation assuming multicultural classroom scenarios in a VR environment

learning_goals: Learners can create a lesson plan with three or more stages according to a reflective systematic instructional design model.
Learners can derive at least two improvement proposals based on self- and peer-assessment after implementing a lesson in a VR simulation environment.
Learners can present three or more instructional design strategies that consider technology integration and multicultural educational contexts.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
